```
---
- name: Playbook to test custom module
  hosts: localhost
  gather_facts: no
  tasks:
    - name: Test the custom module
      practicalansible.examples.remote_filecopy:
        source: /tmp/foo
        dest: /tmp/bar
      register: testresult
    - name: Print the test result data
      ansible.builtin.debug:
        var: testresult
```
